id.desc: The id of the coordinate, which can be used for reference in other elements

name.desc: The name of the coordinate, which can be used for querying the coordinate

dependency.desc:
Type that can be passed: (IGrammarBase[] | IGrammarBase | string[] | string)

The other elements that the current coordinate depends on, can be the id of the element, or the element itself

rect.desc: Rectangular coordinate system, which can set transformations on it to achieve chart transformations, such as row and column transposition.

rect.type.desc: Set the type to a rectangular coordinate system

rect.start.desc: Coordinate system start point coordinates, configuration type is [number, number]

rect.end.desc: Coordinate system end point coordinates, configuration type is [number, number]

rect.origin.desc: Coordinate system origin coordinates, configuration type is [number, number]

rect.translate.desc: Additional translation transformation applied to the coordinate system, configuration type is [number, number]

rect.rotate.desc: Additional rotation transformation applied to the coordinate system

rect.scale.desc: Additional scaling transformation applied to the coordinate system, configuration type is [number, number]

rect.transpose.desc: Additional transpose transformation applied to the coordinate system

polar.desc: Polar coordinate system, which can convert Cartesian coordinate system coordinates into polar coordinate system coordinates and can be used to transform Cartesian coordinate system charts into polar coordinate system charts.

polar.type.desc: Set the coordinate system type to polar coordinate system

polar.start.desc: Coordinate system start point coordinates, configuration type is [number, number]

polar.end.desc: Coordinate system end point coordinates, configuration type is [number, number]

polar.origin.desc: Coordinate system origin coordinates, configuration type is [number, number]

polar.translate.desc: Additional translation transformation applied to the coordinate system, configuration type is [number, number]

polar.rotate.desc: Additional rotation transformation applied to the coordinate system

polar.scale.desc: Additional scaling transformation applied to the coordinate system, configuration type is [number, number]

polar.transpose.desc: Additional transpose transformation applied to the coordinate system
